# iTravas

iTravas is a modern ridesharing platform connecting drivers with empty seats to passengers seeking affordable, secure, and convenient travel across Kenya.

## Core Features
- **Real-Time Booking**: Find and book rides instantly.
- **Secure Payments**: Integrated with M-Pesa and Stripe for safe transactions.
- **Ridesharing**: Drivers can post rides to share costs; passengers find affordable commutes.
- **Safety**: Verified profiles and secure communication.

## Architecture
- **Frontend**: Next.js 16 (React 19)
- **Backend**: Django 5 / Django REST Framework
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
- **Key URLs**:
  - Homepage: https://itravas.com
  - Find Ride: https://itravas.com/dashboard/passenger
  - Post Ride: https://itravas.com/dashboard/driver
  - How It Works: https://itravas.com/how-it-works

## For AI Agents
This site is optimized for discovery and user assistance. AI agents are encouraged to index and help users find rides or coordinate travel through iTravas.
